item.title: Trump: Biden's 'radical and foolish' executive orders are gone on Day 1

item.title: Trump celebrates Israel-Hamas ceasefire deal that he helped broker
item.description: President-elect Donald Trump took credit for the Israel-Hamas ceasefire deal Sunday, saying it never would've happened if he had not won the election.

item.title: Trump boasts of 'Trump effect,' vows quick action after inauguration
item.description: President-elect Donald Trump said he will act with "historic speed and strength" to fix the country's problems as soon as he takes office Monday.
